subject: JunitReport for multiple Runs ?
msgSnippet: Hello, I d like to run a junit test (1.4) multiple times with different input data. This works well with ant, but the created report using junitreport task
messageBody:
Hello,

I'd like to run a junit test (1.4) multiple times with
different input data. This works well with ant, but
the created report using junitreport task does contain only one page per
junit class. I'd like to have a page for each run, is there any known
way to archive this ?

Thanks, Carsten
